summary: Adds a new follower, Benson The Butler, at the entrance to Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[i] After watching his former master burned alive by a dragon at Helgen, Benson The Butler wandered in grief until learning of the Dragonborn. Now he knows his destiny! To serve alongside this amazing individual and become their dutiful ward. Enter BENSON THE BUTLER![/i]

This simple mod will add a new follower NPC named Benson The Butler to entrance of Riverwood. He specializes in Archery and one-handed weapons. His stats will scale to your level and he has only a few perks to make him formidable without turning him into a fun-killing powerhouse.

He starts off with very simple gear (Hunting Bow, some steel arrows, a dagger) but should equip anything the player gives him of better quality.

Screenshots taken using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20429] Midhrastic ENB [/url].
The fancy armor Benson is wearing in the screenshots is the Black Dementia Suit from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13307]Craftable Sheogorath Suits by wetsail[/url], download so that your Benson can walk around with [b]MAXIMUM SWAGGER[/b].

I\'m still learning the ins and outs of Creation Kit so please let me know if you find any bugs and such. Enjoy!
author: thequimper
